content: lane bookmark is a delicate lace bookmark made in size 10 cotton crochet thread it s a pretty addition to a favorite book this lovely lacy bookmark makes a great gift or market item these notes contain affiliate links if you click one and then make a purchase i will earn a small commission at no additional cost to you see my disclosure 1 for details this pattern is available free ad-supported on my website here https //bananamoonstudio com/crochet-lace-bookmark-pattern/ you also have the option to purchase an inexpensive pdf here on ravelry or in my etsy shop 2 a video tutorial for the stitch pattern can be found here https //youtu be/mkuzjecnvm4 difficulty level easy finished measurements 1 3/4 x 6 1/2 inches thread aunt lydia s classic crochet thread 3 size 10 100% mercerized cotton 350 yds yarn weight category 0/lace 1 spool taupe clair or frosty green crochet hook 1 8 mm 4 or size needed to match gauge notions tapestry needle 5 gauge 4 pattern repeats x 18 row = about 4 inches in arched lace stitch p 159 harmony guides basic crochet stitches notes this crochet pattern uses us standard terms for help with abbreviations get my free printable list of crochet abbreviations 6 see this tutorial for help with basic crochet stitches 7 get a free digital gift when you subscribe to my newsletter https //bananamoonstudio com/newsletter-sign-up always find
